content: cuddle up with a chunky crochet blanket this blanket works up quickly and can be made to any size you like **this is less-so a pattern and more of a recipe for a seriously cozy blanket ** notes for a 75-inch square blanket you will need * three skeins of lion brand thick and quick yarn 106 yards each for each stripe color total of 9 skeins * ten skeins of lion brand yarn 122-098 thick & quick bonus bundle yarn 223 yards each main color * 10 mm crochet hook the colors i used were * white fisherman * yellow madison mustard * grey chicago charcoal * navy navy note this one i was only able to find in the bonus bundle size - you ll need two skeins of the bonus bundle size for the two stripes and you ll have a ton leftover please note this is more of a pattern recipe find instructions here 1 1 https //www amknits com/2020/12/chunky-alpine-crochet-blanket-pattern html
